long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time navigating BoardGameGeek with this extension! Hover over any BoardGameGeek link, and a window will appear with summary information (ratings, weight, player count, playing time, etc.) about the board game.

Hold Ctrl while the summary window is open to interact with it and load ratings, designer pages, and more!
